特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: Students can learn all of the material with no prior background in finance, accounting, or Excel.
授業の概要・背景: The course will cover, among other topics, the concepts and practice of personal budgeting, including kakeibo, the fundamentals of investing, and the key steps and principles in starting and growing a business.
授業方法: Students drive the class. Hands-on practice (on paper/Excel spreadsheets), class discussions, readings, videos, podcasts, real-life examples, Power Point slides, and student presentations
